infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: We only add tickets to your Photos (without viewing other images). Example: Your event ticket QR code is saved for quick access at the venue
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We save your event tickets to Photos so you can access them offline. Example: After purchase, your ticket QR code is saved to your camera roll for backup
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need camera access to scan QR codes on event tickets. Example: When you purchase a ticket, point your camera at its QR code to validate entry
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to show events near you. For example, when you're in downtown, we display events within 5 miles. Your location is only used while the app is open.
